description:
Do you love working with numbers and solving problems? Are you a whiz at accounting software and eager to collaborate with great teams?

This remote Senior Accountant role is the perfect opportunity for you to leverage your skills and make a real impact!

What You'll Do

Be a master of daily, monthly, and quarterly accounting tasks - think system reconciliations, error reviews, and keeping everything running smoothly.

Process journal entries with precision and ensure all transactions are recorded accurately.

Take charge of wire payments, cash transactions, and ensure everything is received and disbursed according to plan.

Help test new accounting system features - you'll be the first to see the latest and greatest!

Partner with both operations and technology teams to ensure seamless collaboration.

Why You're a Perfect Fit

You have strong operational experience and a knack for getting things done.

Bonus points if you have experience in insurance accounting!

You're a PeopleSoft pro (or eager to learn!).

You can tackle complex spreadsheets with ease (Excel skills are a must!).

You're familiar with Essbase/Smartview queries, OAC queries, and narrative reporting.

An accounting degree is a plus, but your experience is what matters most!

Ready to take your accounting skills remote and join a supportive team? Apply today!

Employment Type: Full-Time
